showcase.featuresDescription: Explore all the intelligent features that make Moliyachi your personal finance companion.
showcase.startJourney: Start your journey to financial wellness with Moliyachi today.
showcase.featureSpendingInsightsDesc: Short, actionable explanations of where your money goes. Understand your spending patterns with AI-powered analysis.
showcase.featureMonthlyPlanningDesc: Warnings when spending is too fast & balance predictions. Stay on track with intelligent alerts.

financialTips.title: Financial Tips
financialTips.subtitle: Quick, actionable guidance to strengthen your finances. Swipe through illustrations in the dialog.
financialTips.swipeThrough: Swipe through the tips with illustrations.
financialTips.tip1Desc: Track income and expenses monthly. Use mobile tools to monitor activity, savings, and repayments automatically. Follow the 50/30/20 rule.
financialTips.tip1Tip: 50% needs, 30% wants, 20% savings or debt repayment.
financialTips.tip2Desc: Save 3–6 months of expenses in reliable deposits (e.g., "Comfort" or "Sandiq" ~21% in UZS) to cover job loss or unexpected costs.
financialTips.tip3Desc: Spend less than you earn, save/invest aggressively (50–70% if possible), and aim for passive income via deposits, investments, or business.
financialTips.tip4Title: Avoid Bad Debt — Use Loans Wisely
financialTips.tip4Desc: Use education loans or microloans for productive goals, not consumption. Borrow only if it increases your earning capacity.
financialTips.tip5Desc: Auto-transfer part of your salary to a deposit each month. Automation builds consistency and reduces impulse spending.
financialTips.tip6Desc: Small, regular deposits grow through compounding (e.g., "Progress" deposit with top-ups). Time in the market beats timing the market.
financialTips.tip7Desc: Learn from free platforms (Coursera, Khan Academy, Investopedia) and bank resources. Ask consultants for tailored advice.
financialTips.tip8Desc: Start now, even with small amounts. Compound growth and long-term deposits accelerate financial independence.
financialTips.tip9Desc: Mix high-yield deposits, long-term investments (real estate, pension funds, business), and FX deposits for currency protection.
financialTips.tip10Desc: Make goals Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound (e.g., save 20M UZS in 12 months for a business fund).
